com.mindfusion.common

Class Convert

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.mindfusion.common.Convert

  • public final class Convert
extends java.lang.Object
    Converts various types to and from string in a locale-independent way.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description

      Converts the specified Color to string.

        public static java.awt.Color toColor(java.lang.String s)
        Description copied from class: Convert

      • fromColor

        public static java.lang.String fromColor(java.awt.Color val)
        Description copied from class: Convert
        Converts the specified Color to string. The resulting string is in the format #AARRGGBB.
